verses.verse: ( The Song of Moses) ( 730 15:1-4 ) הַאֲזִ֥ינוּ <WH238> ha·’ă·zî·nū Give ear, הַשָּׁמַ֖יִם <WH8064> haš·šā·ma·yim O heavens, וַאֲדַבֵּ֑רָה <WH1696> wa·’ă·ḏab·bê·rāh and I will speak; וְתִשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> wə·ṯiš·ma‘ hear, הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ O earth, אִמְרֵי־ <WH561> ’im·rê- the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> p̄î of my mouth.

יַעֲרֹ֤ף <WH6201> ya·‘ă·rōp̄ fall כַּמָּטָר֙ <WH4306> kam·mā·ṭār like rain לִקְחִ֔י <WH3948> liq·ḥî Let my teaching תִּזַּ֥ל <WH5140> tiz·zal settle כַּטַּ֖ל <WH2919> kaṭ·ṭal like dew, אִמְרָתִ֑י <WH565> ’im·rā·ṯî and my speech כִּשְׂעִירִ֣ם <WH8164> kiś·‘î·rim like gentle rain עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> ‘ă·lê- on דֶ֔שֶׁא <WH1877> ḏe·še new grass, וְכִרְבִיבִ֖ים <WH7241> wə·ḵir·ḇî·ḇîm like showers עֲלֵי־ <WH5921> ‘ă·lê- on עֵֽשֶׂב׃ <WH6212> ‘ê·śeḇ tender plants.

כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî For שֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> šêm the name יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD. אֶקְרָ֑א <WH7121> ’eq·rā I will proclaim הָב֥וּ <WH3051> hā·ḇū Ascribe גֹ֖דֶל <WH1433> ḡō·ḏel greatness לֵאלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <WH430> lê·lō·hê·nū to our God!

הַצּוּר֙ <WH6697> haṣ·ṣūr [He is] the Rock, תָּמִ֣ים <WH8549> tā·mîm is perfect; פָּעֳל֔וֹ <WH6467> pā·‘o·lōw His work כִּ֥י <WH3588> kî ... כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all דְּרָכָ֖יו <WH1870> də·rā·ḵāw His ways מִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> miš·pāṭ are just. אֵ֤ל <WH410> ’êl A God אֱמוּנָה֙ <WH530> ’ĕ·mū·nāh of faithfulness וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> wə·’ên without עָ֔וֶל <WH5766> ‘ā·wel injustice, צַדִּ֥יק <WH6662> ṣad·dîq righteous וְיָשָׁ֖ר <WH3477> wə·yā·šār and upright הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> hū [is] He.

שִׁחֵ֥ת <WH7843> ši·ḥêṯ [His people] have acted corruptly ל֛וֹ Prep│3ms ( lōw) toward Him; לֹ֖א 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō) not בָּנָ֣יו 1121 N-mpc│3ms ( bā·nāw) that of His children, מוּמָ֑ם 3971 N-msc│3mp ( mū·mām) the spot [on them is] דּ֥וֹר 1755 N-ms ( dō·wr) generation. עִקֵּ֖שׁ 6141 Adj-ms ( ‘iq·qêš) but of a perverse וּפְתַלְתֹּֽל׃ 6618 Conj-w│Adj-ms ( ū·p̄ə·ṯal·tōl) and crooked

הֲ־ Interrog ( hă-) לַיְהוָה֙ 3068 Prep-l│N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD, תִּגְמְלוּ־ 1580 V-Qal-Imperf-2mp ( tiḡ·mə·lū-) how you repay זֹ֔את 2063 Pro-fs ( zōṯ) Is this עַ֥ם 5971 N-ms ( ‘am) people? נָבָ֖ל 5036 Adj-ms ( nā·ḇāl) O foolish וְלֹ֣א 3808 Conj-w│Adv-NegPrt ( wə·lō) and senseless חָכָ֑ם 2450 Adj-ms ( ḥā·ḵām) ... הֲלוֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( hă·lō·w-) not הוּא֙ 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) Is He אָבִ֣יךָ 1 N-msc│2ms ( ’ā·ḇî·ḵā) your Father קָּנֶ֔ךָ 7069 V-Qal-Perf-3ms│2ms ( qā·ne·ḵā) and Creator? ה֥וּא 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) Has He not עָֽשְׂךָ֖ 6213 V-Qal-Perf-3ms│2ms ( ‘ā·śə·ḵā) made you וַֽיְכֹנְנֶֽךָ׃ 3559 Conj-w│V-Piel-ConsecImperf-3ms│2ms ( way·ḵō·nə·ne·ḵā) and established you?

זְכֹר֙ <WH2142> zə·ḵōr Remember יְמ֣וֹת <WH3117> yə·mō·wṯ the days עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> ‘ō·w·lām of old; בִּ֖ינוּ <WH995> bî·nū consider שְׁנ֣וֹת <WH8141> šə·nō·wṯ the years דּוֹר־ <WH1755> dō·wr- long וָד֑וֹר <WH1755> wā·ḏō·wr past. שְׁאַ֤ל <WH7592> šə·’al Ask אָבִ֙יךָ֙ <WH1> ’ā·ḇî·ḵā your father, וְיַגֵּ֔דְךָ <WH5046> wə·yag·gê·ḏə·ḵā and he will tell you, זְקֵנֶ֖יךָ <WH2205> zə·qê·ne·ḵā your elders, וְיֹ֥אמְרוּ <WH559> wə·yō·mə·rū and they will inform לָֽךְ׃ Prep│2ms ( lāḵ) you.

בְּהַנְחֵ֤ל <WH5157> bə·han·ḥêl their inheritance, עֶלְיוֹן֙ <WH5945> ‘el·yō·wn When the Most High גּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> gō·w·yim gave the nations בְּהַפְרִיד֖וֹ <WH6504> bə·hap̄·rî·ḏōw when He divided בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> bə·nê the sons אָדָ֑ם <WH120> ’ā·ḏām of man, יַצֵּב֙ <WH5324> yaṣ·ṣêḇ He set גְּבֻלֹ֣ת <WH1367> gə·ḇu·lōṯ the boundaries עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> ‘am·mîm of the peoples לְמִסְפַּ֖ר <WH4557> lə·mis·par according to the number בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> bə·nê of the sons יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> yiś·rā·’êl of God. ( DSS; LXX according to the number of the angels of God; MT according to the number of the sons of Israel)

כִּ֛י <WH3588> kî But חֵ֥לֶק <WH2506> ḥê·leq portion יְהֹוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD’s עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> ‘am·mōw is His people, יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya·‘ă·qōḇ Jacob חֶ֥בֶל <WH2256> ḥe·ḇel His allotted נַחֲלָתֽוֹ׃ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯōw inheritance.

יִמְצָאֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH4672> yim·ṣā·’ê·hū He found him בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> bə·’e·reṣ land, מִדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> miḏ·bār in a desert וּבְתֹ֖הוּ <WH8414> ū·ḇə·ṯō·hū in a barren, יְלֵ֣ל <WH3214> yə·lêl howling יְשִׁמֹ֑ן <WH3452> yə·ši·mōn wilderness; יְסֹֽבְבֶ֙נְהוּ֙ <WH5437> yə·sō·ḇə·ḇen·hū He surrounded him, יְב֣וֹנְנֵ֔הוּ <WH995> yə·ḇō·wn·nê·hū He instructed him, יִצְּרֶ֖נְהוּ <WH5341> yiṣ·ṣə·ren·hū He guarded him כְּאִישׁ֥וֹן <WH380> kə·’î·šō·wn as the apple ( Literally the pupil) עֵינֽוֹ׃ <WH5869> ‘ê·nōw of His eye.

כְּנֶ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH5404> kə·ne·šer As an eagle יָעִ֣יר <WH5782> yā·‘îr stirs up קִנּ֔וֹ <WH7064> qin·nōw its nest עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- over גּוֹזָלָ֖יו <WH1469> gō·w·zā·lāw its young, יְרַחֵ֑ף <WH7363> yə·ra·ḥêp̄ and hovers יִפְרֹ֤שׂ <WH6566> yip̄·rōś He spread כְּנָפָיו֙ <WH3671> kə·nā·p̄āw His wings יִקָּחֵ֔הוּ <WH3947> yiq·qā·ḥê·hū to catch them יִשָּׂאֵ֖הוּ <WH5375> yiś·śā·’ê·hū [and] carried them עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on אֶבְרָתֽוֹ׃ <WH84> ’eḇ·rā·ṯōw His pinions. ( Pinions are the outer parts of a bird’s wings, including the flight feathers.)

יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD בָּדָ֣ד <WH910> bā·ḏāḏ alone יַנְחֶ֑נּוּ <WH5148> yan·ḥen·nū led him, וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> wə·’ên and no עִמּ֖וֹ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw [was] with him. אֵ֥ל <WH410> ’êl god נֵכָֽר׃ <WH5236> nê·ḵār foreign

יַרְכִּבֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH7392> yar·ki·ḇê·hū He made him ride עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on בָּמוֹתֵי <WH1116> bå̄·mō·ṯē the heights אָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ’ā·reṣ of the land וַיֹּאכַ֖ל <WH398> way·yō·ḵal and fed him תְּנוּבֹ֣ת <WH8570> tə·nū·ḇōṯ the produce שָׂדָ֑י <WH7704> śā·ḏāy of the field. וַיֵּנִקֵ֤הֽוּ <WH3243> way·yê·ni·qê·hū He nourished him דְבַשׁ֙ <WH1706> ḏə·ḇaš with honey מִסֶּ֔לַע <WH5553> mis·se·la‘ from the rock וְשֶׁ֖מֶן <WH8081> wə·še·men and oil מֵחַלְמִ֥ישׁ <WH2496> mê·ḥal·mîš from the flinty צֽוּר׃ <WH6697> ṣūr crag,

חֶמְאַ֨ת <WH2529> ḥem·’aṯ with curds בָּקָ֜ר <WH1241> bā·qār from the herd וַחֲלֵ֣ב <WH2461> wa·ḥă·lêḇ and milk צֹ֗אן <WH6629> ṣōn from the flock, עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- with חֵ֨לֶב <WH2459> ḥê·leḇ the fat כָּרִ֜ים <WH3733> kā·rîm of lambs, וְאֵילִ֤ים <WH352> wə·’ê·lîm with rams בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> bə·nê- from Bashan בָשָׁן֙ <WH1316> ḇā·šān ..., וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <WH6260> wə·‘at·tū·ḏîm and goats, עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- with חֵ֖לֶב <WH2459> ḥê·leḇ the choicest כִּלְי֣וֹת <WH3629> kil·yō·wṯ grains חִטָּ֑ה <WH2406> ḥiṭ·ṭāh of wheat. וְדַם־ <WH1818> wə·ḏam- From the juice עֵנָ֖ב <WH6025> ‘ê·nāḇ of the finest grapes תִּשְׁתֶּה־ <WH8354> tiš·teh- you drank חָֽמֶר׃ <WH2561> ḥā·mer the wine.

וַיִּשְׁמַ֤ן <WH8080> way·yiš·man grew fat יְשֻׁרוּן֙ <WH3484> yə·šu·rūn But Jeshurun ( Jeshurun means the upright one, a term of endearment for Israel.) וַיִּבְעָ֔ט <WH1163> way·yiḇ·‘āṭ and kicked — שָׁמַ֖נְתָּ <WH8080> šā·man·tā becoming fat, עָבִ֣יתָ <WH5666> ‘ā·ḇî·ṯā bloated, כָּשִׂ֑יתָ <WH3780> kā·śî·ṯā and gorged. וַיִּטֹּשׁ֙ <WH5203> way·yiṭ·ṭōš He abandoned אֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> ’ĕ·lō·w·ha the God עָשָׂ֔הוּ <WH6213> ‘ā·śā·hū who made him וַיְנַבֵּ֖ל <WH5034> way·nab·bêl and scorned צ֥וּר <WH6697> ṣūr the Rock יְשֻׁעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> yə·šu·‘ā·ṯōw of his salvation.

יַקְנִאֻ֖הוּ <WH7065> yaq·ni·’u·hū They provoked His jealousy בְּזָרִ֑ים <WH2114> bə·zā·rîm with foreign gods; בְּתוֹעֵבֹ֖ת <WH8441> bə·ṯō·w·‘ê·ḇōṯ with abominations. יַכְעִיסֻֽהוּ׃ <WH3707> yaḵ·‘î·su·hū they enraged Him

יִזְבְּח֗וּ <WH2076> yiz·bə·ḥū They sacrificed לַשֵּׁדִים֙ <WH7700> laš·šê·ḏîm to demons, לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō not אֱלֹ֔הַ <WH433> ’ĕ·lō·ha to God, אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> ’ĕ·lō·hîm to gods לֹ֣א <WH3808> lō they had not יְדָע֑וּם <WH3045> yə·ḏā·‘ūm known, חֲדָשִׁים֙ <WH2319> ḥă·ḏā·šîm to newly arrived [gods] מִקָּרֹ֣ב <WH7138> miq·qā·rōḇ ... בָּ֔אוּ <WH935> bā·’ū ..., לֹ֥א <WH3808> lō did not שְׂעָר֖וּם <WH8175> śə·‘ā·rūm fear. אֲבֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> ’ă·ḇō·ṯê·ḵem which your fathers

צ֥וּר <WH6697> ṣūr the Rock יְלָדְךָ֖ <WH3205> yə·lā·ḏə·ḵā who brought you forth; תֶּ֑שִׁי <WH7876> te·šî You ignored וַתִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <WH7911> wat·tiš·kaḥ you forgot אֵ֥ל <WH410> ’êl the God מְחֹלְלֶֽךָ׃ <WH2342> mə·ḥō·lə·le·ḵā who gave you birth.

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> way·yar saw this, יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh When the LORD וַיִּנְאָ֑ץ <WH5006> way·yin·’āṣ He rejected [them], מִכַּ֥עַס <WH3708> mik·ka·‘as provoked to anger בָּנָ֖יו <WH1121> bā·nāw by His sons וּבְנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH1323> ū·ḇə·nō·ṯāw and daughters.

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> way·yō·mer He said: אַסְתִּ֤ירָה <WH5641> ’as·tî·rāh “ I will hide פָנַי֙ <WH6440> p̄ā·nay My face from them; מֵהֶ֔ם Prep-m│Pro-3mp ( mê·hem) they אֶרְאֶ֖ה 7200 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’er·’eh) I will see מָ֣ה 4100 Interrog ( māh) what [will be] אַחֲרִיתָ֑ם 319 N-fsc│3mp ( ’a·ḥă·rî·ṯām) their end. כִּ֣י 3588 Conj ( kî) For ד֤וֹר 1755 N-msc ( ḏō·wr) generation — תַּהְפֻּכֹת֙ 8419 N-fp ( tah·pu·ḵōṯ) are a perverse הֵ֔מָּה 1992 Pro-3mp ( hêm·māh) ... בָּנִ֖ים 1121 N-mp ( bā·nîm) children לֹא־ 3808 Adv-NegPrt ( lō-) vvv אֵמֻ֥ן 529 N-ms ( ’ê·mun) of unfaithfulness בָּֽם׃ Prep│3mp ( bām) .

הֵ֚ם <WH1992> hêm They קִנְא֣וּנִי <WH7065> qin·’ū·nî have provoked My jealousy בְלֹא־ <WH3808> ḇə·lō- by [that which is] not אֵ֔ל <WH410> ’êl God; כִּעֲס֖וּנִי <WH3707> ki·‘ă·sū·nî they have enraged Me בְּהַבְלֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1892> bə·haḇ·lê·hem with their worthless idols. וַאֲנִי֙ <WH589> wa·’ă·nî So I אַקְנִיאֵ֣ם <WH7065> ’aq·nî·’êm will make them jealous בְּלֹא־ <WH3808> bə·lō- by those who are not עָ֔ם <WH5971> ‘ām a people; ( Or not a nation; see also LXX.) בְּג֥וֹי <WH1471> bə·ḡō·w by a nation נָבָ֖ל <WH5036> nā·ḇāl without understanding. ( Cited in ) אַכְעִיסֵֽם׃ <WH3707> ’aḵ·‘î·sêm I will make them angry
